channel.title: Few questions [MoonSpell]
channel.description:
Hey mopar, I just started to take a look at the source MoonSpell, This is something very strange compared to most servers,
So how would i make myself Admin/mod
When i go to do command, ::players online it says wrong syntax
How would i test the stability by the test stability command, along with mass npc spawn
Thanks for looking and hope you can help.

item.title: Few questions [MoonSpell]
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

moonspell < handler < persistencehandler

and commands read the command handler first…
for spawn it would be like

::spawn: id, amount
^
off the top of my head.

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions [MoonSpell]
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

Old Rsc Player:

when players first login, thats when there account is made <–Hint.

Yea but i still dont understand really, Like i can not edit the playersname.msi installer which it saves players in, so im not sure how to do it.

Read full topic
